processingCommand.script:
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CONFIGURE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CONFIGURE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &DB_UPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,DB_UPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &UPDATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,UPDATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &KEYSTORE_PATH# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,KEYSTORE_PATH,1)
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)

:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &CONFIGURE_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &DB_UPDATE_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &UPDATEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &KEYSTORE_PATH# 
:PUB &TZ#

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:DEFINE &ATICKET#, string, 20
:FILL &ATICKET#[] = STR_SPLIT("&TICKET#", ",")
:PUBLISH &ATICKET#[],,WORKFLOW


:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

! Restart type
:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = "Mbuild"
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "with mbuild"
:ELSE
:  SET &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE# = "without mbuild"
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:IF &CHILD_SERVICE# = "JDA WM - TEST"
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:ELSE
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.HTTPS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CHECK_RPTAB# = "true"
:PUBLISH &CHECK_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &COPY_INTEGRATOR# = "N"
:PUBLISH &COPY_INTEGRATOR#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
